Title: A Most Powerful Adversary
Writer: Tom Perrotta (based on the book by), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Damon Lindelof, Patrick Somerville
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Margaret Qualley
Plot: Nora gives Kevin and Jill news they weren't expecting. Laurie makes a rash decision that affects the Garveys. Kevin deals with the fall-out of Nora's news.
